item.title: Status at the top of the screen will not stay up
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

[quote=“ziplock, post:1, topic:238803”]emmkay. at the top of the screen (sendFrame126) it displays how many people are online and the server name, but it only appears when you teleport somewhere and it goes away in about 2 seconds.
how do i make it stay up their. im adding catslewars and its really making me mad because the status of castle wars is dissapearing.

Here is my method.

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @gre@zipl0ck", 6570); sendFrame126("@cya@owner-@red@zipl0ck", 6572); sendFrame126(" @red@Players On - " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673); //6673 } [/quote]

try adding cords for where it should be popped up at… its possible to make them stay you just need to set the bounds for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Status at the top of the screen will not stay up
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

emmkay. at the top of the screen (sendFrame126) it displays how many people are online and the server name, but it only appears when you teleport somewhere and it goes away in about 2 seconds.
how do i make it stay up their. im adding catslewars and its really making me mad because the status of castle wars is dissapearing.

Here is my method.

    public void writePlayers() {
    int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount();
    sendFrame126("                        @gre@zipl0ck", 6570);
    sendFrame126("@cya@owner-@red@zipl0ck", 6572);
    sendFrame126("   @red@Players On - " + players, 6664);
    setInterfaceWalkable(6673); //6673
    }

Read full topic
